body: i’m thankful for how funny it is that even though i packed an enormous suitcase, i somehow forgot to put more than three pairs of underwear in it. i’m thankful there is a target near our conference hotel.
normalized_markdown: i’m thankful for how funny it is that even though i packed an enormous suitcase, i somehow forgot to put more than three pairs of underwear in it. i’m thankful there is a target near our conference hotel.
